text: Nambo wanganyao watite: “(Ayi yaakuwecheta Muhammadi ﷺ iwele) sagamisi syewanganyichilane.” (Ndawi jine akutiji): “Nambo jute kuilukanya (nsyene).” (Pane ni akutiji): “Nambo jwalakweju nkwimba ilaanga, basi ayiche nacho kukwetu chisimosimo mpela yawatite pakutumisyilidwa (achimitume) wandanda.”
